alfredsnippet.snippet: python manage.py openapi generate_server_code -f --output-dir codegen/crm-python-flask -s specs/crm/openapi.yaml && cp ./codegen/crm-python-flask/openapi_server/models/* ./src/models/openapi/generated/crm && rm ./src/models/openapi/generated/crm/base_model_.py && python manage.py openapi create_subclasses
alfredsnippet.name: CRM Server Code
